statements: DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < min_stock OR material_type = 'Raw Material';
DELETE FROM finished_products WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM raw_materials WHERE material_id = 123 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM finished_products WHERE quantity < 5 AND product_name = 'Example Product';
DELETE FROM FinishedProducts WHERE product_id = 100 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE name = 'Supplier X';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND product_id = (SELECT id FROM finished_products WHERE name = 'WidgetA');
